item.title: USB Drive Corrupted? Let's just fix it!
item.description: Recently, I was trying to boot ubuntu to an old system. And while I was making my bootable USB drive, somehow my USB drive got corrupted. I tried to format it, but it was not working. I tried to fix it using chkdsk, but it was not working either. So I thought, why not just fix it using diskpart? So here is how I did it. Steps Open cmd as administrator.
